channel.title: Anti-null help :S
channel.description:
Hello when my server nulls i get this error in the cmd and was thinking any way to fix this?
[code]Error with player 5, Lil stormy java.lang.NullPointerException at client.declineTrade(client.java:8114) at client.declineTrade(client.java:8094) at client.declineTrade(client.java:8086) at client.savegame(client.java:17416) at client.logout(client.java:9743) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16541) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:272) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) null null null null[/code]
As you can see i get that error then my server stats nullin..
Help is much appreciated
Thanks

item.title: Anti-null help :S
